inboundEndpoints.description: Connect to an OPC UA server and publish data to Azure.

address.description: The endpoint URL of the OPC UA server to connect to.

additionalConfigurationSchema.title: DeviceEndpointModel
additionalConfigurationSchema.description: Configuration model for OPC UA endpoint security and connection settings.

EndpointSecurityPolicy.description: The security policy URI to use for the endpoint connection. Defines the encryption and signing algorithms used for communication.

errorMessage.type: Must be a string or null

EndpointSecurityMode.description: The security mode to use for the endpoint. None (no security), Sign (messages signed), or SignAndEncrypt (messages signed and encrypted).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: None, Sign, SignAndEncrypt

UseReverseConnect.description: Use reverse connect to connect to the endpoint. Enable when the server needs to initiate the connection to the client.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

RunAssetDiscovery.description: Runs asset discovery on the endpoint. Enable to automatically discover and catalog available assets.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

AssetTypes.description: List of asset types to discover when RunAssetDiscovery is enabled. Each type must be unique.

items.minLength: Asset type name cannot be empty
items.maxLength: Asset type name cannot exceed 256 characters

DumpConnectionDiagnostics.description: Enables detailed server diagnostics logging for the connection. Enable for troubleshooting connection issues.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

datasetConfigurationSchema.title: DataSetEventModel
datasetConfigurationSchema.description: Dataset and event default and resource additional configuration model. Inherits all properties from PublishedNodesEntryModel and adds mapped properties for samplingInterval, publishingInterval, keyFrameCount, and StartInstance.

publishingInterval.description: The publishing interval in milliseconds for this dataset writer. Controls how frequently data is published.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

samplingInterval.description: Default sampling interval in milliseconds for all data points in the dataset. Controls how frequently data is read from nodes.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

MessageEncoding.description: The encoding format to use for messages. Json (human-readable), Avro (raw format).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: Json, Uadp, Binary

keyFrameCount.description: Controls key frame insertion frequency in the message stream. Higher values reduce bandwidth but increase latency for new subscribers.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted

Priority.description: Priority of the writer subscription (0-255). Higher values indicate higher priority for resource allocation and processing.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted

DataSetClassId.description: The optional dataset class id as it shall appear in dataset messages and dataset metadata.

DataSetDescription.description: The optional description of the dataset.

DataSetExtensionFields.description: Optional key-value pairs inserted into key frame and metadata messages in the same data set.

DefaultHeartbeatInterval.description: The interval in milliseconds at which to publish heartbeat messages.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

DefaultHeartbeatBehavior.description: Configures how heartbeat messages are handled for all nodes. WatchChange (on value changes), Periodically (fixed intervals), or None (disabled).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: WatchChange, Periodically, None

SendKeepAliveDataSetMessages.description: Controls whether to send keep alive messages for this dataset. Enable to maintain connection health monitoring.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean value

MaxKeepAliveCount.description: Defines how many publishing timer expirations to wait before sending a keep-alive message. Larger values reduce traffic but increase detection time.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted

DataSetWriterWatchdogBehavior.description: Defines what action to take when the watchdog timer triggers. Restart (reinitialize writer), Halt (stop publishing), or Continue (keep running).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: Restart, Halt, Continue

OpcNodeWatchdogCondition.description: Specifies the condition that triggers the watchdog behavior. NoData (no updates received), Error (error occurs), or Any (either condition).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: NoData, Error, Any

DisableSubscriptionTransfer.description: Controls whether subscription transfer is disabled during reconnect. Enable to prevent subscription state transfer.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

RepublishAfterTransfer.description: Controls whether to republish missed values after a subscription is transferred during reconnect handling. Enable to ensure data consistency.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

SamplingInterval.description: Server-side sampling rate in milliseconds. The value 0 means use the fastest practical rate.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

AttributeId.description: The OPC UA attribute to monitor on the node. Specifies which characteristic of the node to monitor.

errorMessage.enum: Must be a valid OPC UA attribute identifier

DataChangeTrigger.description: Specifies what triggers value change notifications: Status (only status changes), StatusValue (status or value changes), or StatusValueTimestamp (status, value, or timestamp changes).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: Status, StatusValue, StatusValueTimestamp

QueueSize.description: Size of the server-side queue for this monitored item. Larger queues consume more memory but provide better buffering.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum queue size (65536)

DeadbandType.description: Deadband type of the data change filter to apply. None (no filtering), Absolute (absolute value change), or Percent (percentage value change).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: None, Absolute, Percent

DeadbandValue.description: Deadband value of the data change filter to apply. For Absolute type, this is the absolute change required. For Percent type, this is the percentage change required (0-100).

errorMessage.type: Must be a number or omitted

DiscardNew.description: Controls queue overflow behavior for monitored items. If true, new values are discarded when queue is full. If false, oldest values are discarded.

RegisterNode.description: Optimize node access using RegisterNodes service. Improves performance for frequently accessed nodes but consumes server resources.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

UseCyclicRead.description: Use periodic reads instead of monitored items. Enable for nodes that don't support subscriptions or for specific polling requirements. Required to be true when using CyclicReadMaxAge.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

CyclicReadMaxAge.description: Maximum age for cached values in cyclic reads (milliseconds). Values older than this are considered stale and will trigger a new read. Only used when UseCyclicRead is true.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported age (4294967295ms)

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

HeartbeatBehavior.description: Controls heartbeat message generation for this node: WatchChange (on value changes), Periodically (at fixed intervals), or None (disabled).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: WatchChange, Periodically, None

SkipFirst.description: Controls handling of initial value notification. If true, skips the first value after subscription creation to avoid initial value spikes.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

IndexRange.description: Range specification for array or string values. Use single index (e.g., '1') or range (e.g., '1:3'). First element is at index 0.

errorMessage.pattern: Must be a single index or range in format 'start:end'

QueueSize.description: Size of the server-side queue for this monitored item. Larger queues consume more memory but provide better buffering.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum queue size (65536)

publishingInterval.description: The publishing interval in milliseconds for this dataset writer. Controls how frequently data is published.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer in milliseconds or omitted
errorMessage.maximum: Must not exceed maximum supported interval (4294967295ms)

DiscardNew.description: Controls queue overflow behavior for monitored items. If true, new values are discarded when queue is full. If false, oldest values are discarded.

EventFilter.description: Event Filter to apply. When specified the node is assumed to be an event notifier node to subscribe to.

SkipFirst.description: Controls handling of initial value notification. If true, skips the first value after subscription creation to avoid initial value spikes.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: Json, Uadp, Binary

Priority.description: Priority of the writer subscription (0-255). Higher values indicate higher priority for resource allocation and processing.

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted

DataSetClassId.description: The optional dataset class id as it shall appear in dataset messages and dataset metadata.

DataSetDescription.description: The optional description of the dataset.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean value

errorMessage.type: Must be an integer or omitted

DataSetWriterWatchdogBehavior.description: Defines what action to take when the watchdog timer triggers. Restart (reinitialize writer), Halt (stop publishing), or Continue (keep running).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: Restart, Halt, Continue

OpcNodeWatchdogCondition.description: Specifies the condition that triggers the watchdog behavior. NoData (no updates received), Error (error occurs), or Any (either condition).

errorMessage.enum: Must be one of: NoData, Error, Any

DisableSubscriptionTransfer.description: Controls whether subscription transfer is disabled during reconnect. Enable to prevent subscription state transfer.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

RepublishAfterTransfer.description: Controls whether to republish missed values after a subscription is transferred during reconnect handling. Enable to ensure data consistency.

errorMessage.type: Must be a boolean or omitted

EventFilterModel.description: Event filter for OPC UA event monitoring.

typeDefinitionId.description: Simple event Type definition node id.

ContentFilterModel.description: Content filter for event filtering (structure not detailed in provided context).

updateInterval.description: Time interval for sending pending interval updates in seconds.

snapshotInterval.description: Time interval for sending pending interval snapshot in seconds.
